name: shotshare
description: Shotshare is a self-hosted screenshot and image sharing service. It lets users quickly upload captures, get shareable links, and manage their image history in a clean web UI.
features: Screenshot uploads: Quickly uploads screenshots and images via web interface or API.
Shareable links: Generates short URLs for instant image sharing.
Direct image hosting: Serves images directly without requiring viewers to visit a page.
Upload history: Maintains a gallery of all uploaded images for easy access.
Drag and drop: Supports drag-and-drop file uploads in the browser.
API access: Provides REST API for integration with screenshot tools like ShareX.
Custom domains: Hosts images on your own domain for branding.
Image deletion: Removes uploaded images manually or with automatic expiration.
No registration: Allows anonymous uploads without requiring user accounts.
Thumbnail generation: Creates thumbnails for faster gallery loading.
Storage management: Tracks storage usage and sets upload limits.
Embed codes: Generates HTML and Markdown embed codes for images.
